sentences.en: He nearly jumped out of his skin when he saw two rats.
sentences.cn: 他看到两只老鼠，几乎给吓丢了魂。

sentences.en: He very nearly died.
sentences.cn: 他差点送命。

sentences.en: He was nearly three times over the drink drive limit.
sentences.cn: 他超过醉酒驾驶规定标准快三倍了。

sentences.en: He will get a pay rise of nearly £4,000.
sentences.cn: 他的工资将会上涨将近4,000英镑。

sentences.en: I nearly always go home for lunch.
sentences.cn: 我几乎总是回家吃午饭。

sentences.en: Investigators say nearly $100,000 was wired into the suspect's bank accounts.
sentences.cn: 调查人员说有近10万美元汇入了嫌疑人的银行账户。

sentences.en: Is the job nearly finished?
sentences.cn: 这工作快干完了吗？

sentences.en: It is nearly always women who are the primary care givers.
sentences.cn: 从事初级保健护理工作的几乎都是女性。

sentences.en: It took nearly two hours to get here.
sentences.cn: 到这里花了将近两小时。

sentences.en: Louise is nearly as tall as her mother.
sentences.cn: 路易丝差不多和她母亲一样高。

sentences.en: Many of their books have been in print for nearly 40 years.
sentences.cn: 他们的很多书都印行将近40年了。

sentences.en: Michelle’s nearly twenty.
sentences.cn: 米歇尔年近二十。

sentences.en: Nearly 60% of our bookings come from repeat business and personal recommendation.
sentences.cn: 我们近60%的订单来自于回头客和熟人介绍。

sentences.en: Nearly everything that could go wrong has gone wrong.
sentences.cn: 差不多可能出乱子的地方都出了乱子。

sentences.en: Nearly one million people crossed over the river into Moldavia.
sentences.cn: 将近100万人渡过这条河进入摩尔达维亚。

sentences.en: New diet books appear at a rate of nearly one a week.
sentences.cn: 新的饮食类书籍差不多一周出一本。

sentences.en: Outside, Bruce glanced at his watch: "Dear me, nearly oneo'clock."
sentences.cn: 出了门，布鲁斯瞥了一眼自己的手表，“天哪，快一点了。”

sentences.en: The project has gone through nearly a dozen years of planning.
sentences.cn: 该项目已历经近12年的规划。

sentences.en: The term "early retirement" is nearly always a euphemism for redundancy nowadays.
sentences.cn: 现在“提前退休”几乎就是裁员的委婉说法。

sentences.en: They spurted blood all over me. I nearly passed out.
sentences.cn: 他们的血喷了我一身。我几乎昏了过去。

sentences.en: Town gardens are ideal because they produce flowers nearly all year round.
sentences.cn: 城市公园是理想去处，那里几乎一年四季鲜花盛开。

sentences.en: you're not nearly as clever as you think you are.
sentences.cn: 你远没有自认为的那样聪明。
